page.title: 06Hypermarket
page.content: Quite near to our school is a new { {Asda Superstore. Asda is a trade name. It stands for Associated Dairies. The store has been built outside the town and the new Asdale Road has been built specially for traffic to get to it. Asda employs a lot of people and most of them are women, but a lot of men work in the warehouse. Thirty-three children in Kettlethorpe Middle School have relatives working there. There is a very{large car park}and customers come from a large area. A special entrance has been made for {buses}and the bus services in the area have been changed so that they all stop at the store. When cars go in and out they pass a { {petrol filling station}with (cont)
